films.description: The extraordinary story of three Rwandan kids who walk 3000 miles to the Soccer World Cup in South Africa...
films.title: Africa United

films.description: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer, and that he has a young male lover.
films.title: Beginners

films.description: A kid from the Midwest moves out to Hollywood in order to follow in his parents footsteps -- and become a porn star.
films.title: Bucky Larson : Born to Be a Star

films.description: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the FBI agent who promised he'd capture him is about to do just that.
films.title: Coup d'éclat

films.description: D'un film à l'autre (From One Film to Another) is an anthology documentary produced by Les Films 13...
films.title: D'un film à l'autre

films.description: This is not the way it was supposed to happen. Like every other morning, Christian Echeveria, huissier...
films.title: Dernier étage, gauche, gauche

films.description: An investigation on the management of 2009 L'Aquila earthquake by Berlusconi government and his staff.
films.title: Draquila : l'Italie qui tremble

films.description: An exiled detective is recruited to solve a series of mysterious deaths that threaten to delay the inauguration of Empress Wu.
films.title: Détective Dee : le mystère de la flamme fantôme

films.description: A complete imbecile struggles to make it through life on his own, until a strange invention makes him unbelievably wealthy.
films.title: Easy Money

films.description: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.
films.title: Fighter

films.description: The story of Giancarlo Siani, a journalist killed by the Neapolitan Mafia in 1985.
films.title: Fortapàsc

films.description: Gianni is a retiree who has become invisible to most everyone around him. In response, he tries his best to generate some kind of extracurricular love life.
films.title: Gianni et les femmes

films.description: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.
films.title: Hell Driver

films.description: When his pregnant fiancee becomes the latest victim of a serial killer, a secret agent blurs the line between good and evil in his pursuit of revenge.
films.title: J'ai rencontré le diable

films.description: In Brooklyn, a youth from an Orthodox Jewish community is lured into becoming an Ecstasy dealer by his pal who has ties to an Israeli drug cartel.
films.title: Jewish Connection

films.description: A hot young Wall Street trader finds a formula based on climatology to play the market and win big... but at what cost?
films.title: Krach

films.description: A true-story account of a German businessman who saved  than 200,000 Chinese during the Nanjing massacre in 1937-38.
films.title: John Rabe

films.description: Toru recalls his life in the 1960s, when his friend Kizuki killed himself and he grew close to Naoko, Kizuki's girlfriend, and another woman, the outgoing, lively Midori.
films.title: La ballade de l'impossible

films.description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.
films.title: La conquête
